title: Justin Trudeau - Wikipedia
snippet: Following the election, Trudeau said he was undecided about seeking the leadership; months later on October 12 at Wilfrid Laurier University, he announced he would not seek the post because he had a young family.

title: Dr. Justin Trudeau | University of North Texas
snippet: Justin Trudeau is an Associate Professor in the Department of Communication Studies at the University of North Texas. He has published primarily in the area of performance genealogy and cultural literary history.

title: Justin Trudeau | University of Toronto
snippet: June 10, 2020 Invited by Justin Trudeau, U of T's Lana El Sanyoura addresses fellow graduates across the country

title: Justin Trudeau - Students | Britannica Kids | Homework Help
snippet: He received a degree in education from the University of British Columbia in 1998. Thereafter he taught high-school French and elementary-school math in Vancouver, British Columbia.
